title: Amazing Grace
lyrics:
[C]Amazing grace, how [G]sweet the sound
[A7]That saved a wretch like [F]me
[C]I once was lost, but [G]now am found
[C]Was blind, but [F]now I [C]see

[C]'Twas grace that [G]taught my heart to [A7]fear
And grace my [F]fears re[C]lieved
[C]How precious did [G]that grace ap[A7]pear
The hour I [F]first be[C]lieved

[C]Through many dangers, [G]toils and snares
[A7]I have already [F]come
[C]'Tis grace has [G]brought me safe [C]thus far
And [F]grace will [C]lead me [G]home

title: Wonderwall
lyrics:
[Em]Today is gonna be the day that they're gonna throw it back to you
[G]By now you should've somehow realized what you gotta do
[D]I don't believe that anybody feels the way I do[A7] about you now

[Em]Backbeat, the word is on the street that the fire in your heart is out
[G]I'm sure you've heard it all before but you never really had a doubt
[D]I don't believe that anybody feels the way I do[A7] about you now

[C]And all the roads we have to walk are [G]winding
[C]And all the lights that lead us there are [G]blinding
[D]There are many things that I would[A7] like to say to you
But I don't know [G]how

[C]Because maybe [Em7]you're gonna be the one that saves me [G]
And after all [Em7]you're my wonderwall [G]

[C]Today was gonna be the day but they'll never throw it back to you
[G]By now you should've somehow realized what you're not to do
[D]I don't believe that anybody feels the way I do[A7] about you now

title: Country Roads
lyrics:
[G]Almost heaven, West [D]Virginia
[Em]Blue Ridge Mountains, [C]Shenandoah [G]River
[G]Life is old there, [D]older than the trees
[Em]Younger than the mountains, [C]growin' like a [G]breeze

[G]Country roads, take me [D]home
To the [Em]place I be[C]long
[G]West Virginia, mountain [D]mama
Take me [C]home, country [G]roads

[G]All my memories, [D]gather 'round her
[Em]Miner's lady, [C]stranger to blue [G]water
[G]Dark and dusty, [D]painted on the sky
[Em]Misty taste of moonshine, [C]teardrop in my [G]eye
